Yes No T&C I accept the Terms and Conditions of this e-service Fee is suggested on distance, time and effort taken to complete the job AIzaSyD7DB_FFjT7BD95SDa4Bv5AYEXTW-0_yys Our deliverMY Can be your extra help. \n Here are some examples
Daily-Paid Maids\n Daily-Paid Drivers\n Send pets to groomers\n Get help to move or assemble furniture \n Daily-Paid Painters \n Plumbers Include any requirements(e.g. Who to contact, What to bring, How to do the task well etc)

I forgot to bring my laptop charger to an important presentation. Luckily deliverMY helped me to deliver the charger within 30 minutes to me. Very helpful service! It is always helpful to have a rider at any time to deliver my company documents to anywhere and anytime. Efficient service with reasonable price. Easy, Cheap and Efficient. Best service. Keep it up team. Reliable and trustable! Rider helped me to buy what I needed on time. I was stuck in traffic. Late to work. But rider saved my day! Forgot my house keys and they helped me within 40 minutes. Recommended and easy! Easy way to get your groceries from home. Rider helped me to buy tomatos on time.

Access to the location service is required to demonstrate the \'my location\' feature, which shows your current location on the map. This sample requires location permission to enable the \'my location\' layer. Please try again and grant access to use the location.\nIf the permission has been permanently denied, it can be enabled from the System Settings > Apps > \'Google Maps API Demos\'. Location permission is required for this demo.
